articles.title: Foreigners pay tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign guests arrive 
    Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- An East European Group for Probing the Truth about GIs' crimes led by Royald Saveliev, vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and Marwan Sudah, chairman of the Arab Committee for Solidarity with the Korean People and Supporting the Reunification of Korea, who is a representative of the Arab region For Probing the Truth about GIs' crimes arrived here today to participate in the international conference for peace on the Korean peninsula and other solidarity functions to be held on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory in the Great Fatherland Liberation War.
 They were met at the airport by Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries,    
Wwho is vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with the World People.
